queryData.apiusagequery: from ApiPerDestinationAgg on apiCreatorTenantDomain=='{{tenantDomain}}' {{apiCondition}} within {{from}}L, {{to}}L per "{{per}}s" select apiName,apiVersion,apiCreator,apiContext,destination,sum(totalRequestCount) as RequestCount group by apiName,apiVersion,apiCreator,apiContext,destination order by RequestCount desc limit {{limit}};
